lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. unit of Nomura Securities Co Ltd of Japan, acting as sole underwriter, won in competitive bidding 250 mln dlrs of extendible notes of General Electric Credit Corp, a subsidiary of General Electric Co <GE>.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Daiwa became the second foreign firm to manage an offering in the domestic debt market in September 1986 when it won in competitive bidding 125 mln dlrs of 10-year first mortgage bonds of General Telephone Co of California, a unit of GTE Corp <GTE>.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Primary dealers are considered an elite group of firms because they are approved to purchase U.
